name: Relevantmedia.ru
overview:
Relevant Media is an innovative Russian internet media company leading in the niche of professional evergreen (how to and Q&A) content.

The company uses a set of proprietary algorithms to analyze search engine requests and then employs a huge network of professional freelancers to create unique content that could be useful and interesting to a Russian Internet user. Every day authors produce hundreds of articles and share their experiences, answering to the most popular questions.

Since its launch, the company has achieved 9M unique visitors, 20M of page views, and has produced 140 000 articles in 2011 alone.

Relevantmedia.ru was launched in October 2010 and is based on globally successful model.

Relevant Media was initially funded by Fast Lane Ventures.

It is headed by CEO Andrey Kuzeev â€“ a strong professional with many years of experience in analytics, advertisement and entrepreneurship in the Russian online media.

For more information, please visit www.relevantmedia.ru
